attributes.action: immediately upon taking up office on 27 June 2007 call a national referendum on whether or not scottish constituency MPs should be removed from their seats in the House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scottish constituency MPs have no mandate from the English or Welsh population of the UK and therefore should not be allowed to take up seats in what is now, in all but name, the English House of Commons.
